Name: Redgate - Deploy from Package
Description:
Uses Redgate's [SQL Change Automation](http://www.red-gate.com/sca/productpage) to deploy a package containing a database schema to a SQL Server database, without a review step.

Requires SQL Change Automation version 3.0.2 or later.

*Version date: 2020-06-19*

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationNuGetDbPackageDownloadStepName
Parameters.Label: Database package step
Parameters.HelpText: Select the step in this project which downloads the database package.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationTargetDatabaseServer
Parameters.Label: Target SQL Server instance
Parameters.HelpText: The fully qualified SQL Server instance name for the target database.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationTargetDatabaseName
Parameters.Label: Target database name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the database to deploy changes to. This must be an existing database.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationTargetUsername
Parameters.Label: Username (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Server username used to connect to the database. If you leave this field and 'Password' blank, Windows authentication will be used to connect instead, using the account that runs the Tentacle service.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationTargetPassword
Parameters.Label: Password (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: You must enter a password if you entered a username.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationFilterPath
Parameters.Label: Filter path (optional)
Parameters.HelpText:
Specify the location of a SQL Compare filter file (.scpf), which defines objects to include/exclude in the schema comparison. Filter files are generated by SQL Source Control.

For more help see [Using SQL Compare filters in SQL Change Automation](http://www.red-gate.com/sca/ps/help/filters).

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationCompareOptions
Parameters.Label: SQL Compare options (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: Enter SQL Compare options to apply when generating the update script. Use a comma-separated list to enter multiple values. For more help see [Using SQL Compare options in SQL Change Automation](http://www.red-gate.com/sca/add-ons/compare-options).

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationDataCompareOptions
Parameters.Label: SQL Data Compare options (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: Enter SQL Data Compare options to apply when generating the update script. Use a comma-separated list to enter multiple values. For more help see [Using SQL Data Compare options in SQL Change Automation](http://www.red-gate.com/sca/ps/help/datacompareoptions).

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationTransactionIsolationLevel
Parameters.Label: Transaction isolation level (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: Select the transaction isolation level to be used in deployment scripts.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationIgnoreStaticData
Parameters.Label: Ignore static data
Parameters.HelpText: Exclude changes to static data when generating the deployment resources.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationQueryBatchTimeout
Parameters.Label: Query batch timeout (in seconds)
Parameters.HelpText: The execution timeout, in seconds, for each batch of queries in the update script. The default value is 30 seconds. A value of zero indicates no execution timeout.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationSkipPostUpdateSchemaCheck
Parameters.Label: Skip post update schema check
Parameters.HelpText: Don't check that the target database has the correct schema after the update has run.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationSpecificModuleVersion
Parameters.Label: SQL Change Automation version (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: If you wish to use a specific version of SQL Change Automation rather than the latest, enter the version number here.

Parameters.Name: DLMAutomationModuleInstallationFolder
Parameters.Label: Module Installation Folder (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: By default, module folders do not persist between steps. Setting this field to a specific folder will ensure that modules persist, and do not have to be downloaded again.
